body: The tension is good. Well, cheating and battling with the guilt from it seems to be picking up in romcom trend these days. Kazuha's last words in the previous volume: "I love you. I love you who can't be mine alone." | By the way, as the first comment mentioned, this is the same as Orihi Chihiro <https://nhentai.net/artist/orihi-chihiro/>. Koumyaku seems to be the name this artist used for the Kazuha x Kanaho arts.

So they are cheating on their gf’s then? 
Well, not my cup of tea but it’s well done and the art is good.

Kazuha did it harder when Kanaho provoke her like that (^ - ^). In the previous story she also asks if she felt better than Kazuha's girlfriend because Kazuha came so much. I wonder how their partners would react though. Kanaho is with Takane without intention to break up, and Kazuha is probably with Renka (popular pairing). But now, both starts renting apartment room to live together.

After reading those two doujins I’m still not sure wether this counts as cheating since Aizawa (short haired) asks Kanaho (white long hair) who does she prefer, her or Takane (blonde haired)

So I’m guessing both girls are cheating on their current partners or it’s just fwb.

whether she or Takane is better
I beg you pls give me moar
This is good. More please! And English Translation please
Need more KazuKana. Love this artist's depiction of their relationship like this artist's work.
左近川鉱脈（織日ちひろ）
